title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.3 - Professional riders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4064.3 - Professional riders

State Regulations

Professional hunt servants, grooms, apprentices, stable
lads and persons who are or have been employed with pay in any capacity in
private, hunting, racing, showing, livery or horsedealers' stables, as well as
persons who have ever received payment, directly or indirectly, for riding are
regarded as having ridden for hire and are professional riders for the purposes
of this Article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4064.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
